Description: The following statement contains a magic number: var client = new PollingClient2(store.Advanced' commit =>                  {                      // Project the commit etc                      Console.WriteLine(Resources.CommitInfo' commit.BucketId' commit.StreamId' commit.CommitSequence);                      // Track the most recent checkpoint                      checkpointToken = commit.CheckpointToken;                      return PollingClient2.HandlingResult.MoveToNext;                  }'                  waitInterval: 3000);
